title.rendered: Alticor Inc Receives Minority Contractors Association Award

content.rendered:
Alticor Inc is the recipient of another small business award / certificate in recognition of their passionate efforts towards maximizing small business participation. On Friday, July 26, 2013 at the Maryland Minority Contractors Association (MMCA’s) 3rd Summer Soiree & Awards Banquet, the President of the Baltimore City Council presented Alticor Inc with the Maryland Minority Contractors Association 2013 Best Practice Award.

The MMCA is a non-profit organization that mentors its minority and women-owned business members who reside within the State of Maryland.

excerpt.rendered: Alticor Inc receives an award from the Maryland Minority Contractors Association and presented by the President of the Baltimore City Council with the Maryland Minority Contractors Association 2013 Best Practice Award.
